content.rendered:
Maple Ave Morning Announcements 

Thursday May 1, 2025 

Today is a “B” Day 

  •   6th Grade Project Lift will be meeting during Flex tomorrow in the Large Group Room. 

 

  • It’s time for some Bucks by the Boatload! Teachers – please have your LiveSchool accounts ready! Today we will award 25 Blue Streak Bucks to each student who was on time to class. That’s right, 25 bucks! Being on time ensures you don’t miss important information at the start of class, positively affects your academic performance and fosters good habits for adulthood. Keep following the 4 B’s to earn more Bucks by the Boatload! 

 

Today’s lunch is French toast sticks, turkey sausage links, cheese omelet, sweet potato bites and orange juice.  

  Be Safe, Be Respectful, Be responsible and Be KIND! 

 As Always, make it a great day or not… the choice is yours.
